column1: The Purple Pig////My FAVORITE restaurant in all of Chicago hands down! The menu changes often but always features delicious
column2: unique flavors. All the ingredients are so fresh and crafted together so perfectly. If on the menu- the broccoli
column4: and duck have been some of my all time favorites! You really can't go wrong with anything on the menu though. For the quality of food
column5: it's very reasonably priced and worth every penny.
